concept.title: Turtle Trek: Ocean's Call
concept.description: Guide a brave, tiny sea turtle hatchling across a sun-drenched, perilous beach. Dodge scuttling crabs, avoid swooping gulls, and navigate environmental hazards to reach the safety of the vast ocean.
concept.theme: Vibrant beach, warm sun, ocean life, nature.
concept.objective: Guide the turtle hatchling from its nest (top of the screen) to the ocean (bottom of the screen) without getting caught or succumbing to hazards.
mechanics: Top-down directional movement (8-way) across the beach.
Briefly hiding or 'tucking' into the shell for momentary protection.
Collecting optional beach items for bonus points.
player_abilities: **Tuck & Wait**: Pressing a button makes the turtle briefly pull its head and limbs into its shell, stopping movement but providing a very short burst of minor damage reduction/invincibility to small hits. High risk/reward as it leaves you stationary.

enemies.name: Crab Scuttler
enemies.behavior: Patrols small areas horizontally or in tight circles. If the turtle gets too close, it charges quickly in a straight line towards the turtle's last known position for a short distance before returning to patrol. Getting hit causes a brief stun and health loss.

enemies.name: Seagull Swooper
enemies.behavior: Flies in from off-screen, circles overhead, and then swoops down rapidly in an arc to attempt to snatch the turtle. If it misses, it flies off screen. If it hits, it carries the turtle back a short distance, causing damage.

enemies.name: Rogue Wave
enemies.behavior: Not an enemy in the traditional sense, but an environmental hazard. Periodically, a large wave sweeps across the lower portion of the beach (closer to the ocean). If caught, the turtle is pushed back significantly and takes damage.

powerups.name: Shiny Shell Fragment
powerups.effect: Grants temporary invulnerability to one hit from a predator or wave, or provides a short burst of speed.

powerups.name: Energizing Algae
powerups.effect: Briefly increases movement speed for a few seconds, allowing quicker escape from threats or faster progress.

concept.level_progression: Levels increase in length and complexity. New environmental obstacles (e.g., driftwood logs, tide pools that slow movement) are introduced. The density and variety of enemies/hazards increase, and their patterns become more intricate. Visual changes like different times of day (dawn, midday, sunset) or slight weather variations (overcast) might occur.
concept.scoring_system: Points are earned for reaching the ocean. A 'Time Bonus' rewards faster completion. 'Survival Bonus' grants points for each segment of health remaining. 'Collectible Bonus' awards points for picking up rare seashells or starfish scattered on the beach, which might be in more dangerous locations.
concept.visual_style: Cute, vibrant pixel art with a slightly 'chunky' and appealing aesthetic. Bright, warm color palette for the sandy beach, shifting to deep blues and greens for the ocean. Clear, expressive animations for the turtle, enemies, and environmental effects like waves and sand trails.
concept.sound_theme: Relaxing and atmospheric, featuring gentle wave sounds, distant seagull cries, and subtle, uplifting chiptune melodies that swell during moments of danger. Distinct, light 'plink' sound for collecting items and a soft 'bonk' for minor hits or hazard interactions.

level_design.name: Hatchling's First Journey
level_design.description: The ocean beckons! Guide your tiny turtle hatchling from its nest across the sandy beach to the welcoming waves. Avoid slow-moving crabs, be mindful of circling gulls, and navigate the gentle, periodic waves at the shore. Collect sparkling seashells for bonus points!

assets.player: A cute, chunky green sea turtle with a brown patterned shell and large, friendly eyes. Animated with simple paddling flippers for movement and a subtle bobbing motion.

enemies.basic: A small, round, bright red pixel crab with two simple black eyes and tiny side-scuttling legs. Moves with a wobbly, side-to-side animation.
enemies.aggressive: A medium-sized, spiky dark blue pufferfish with a slightly menacing expression (small, angular eyes) and a pixelated silhouette that can expand slightly when agitated.

powerups.health: A glowing, pixelated red heart icon, gently pulsing. Appears with a slight sparkle effect when collected.
powerups.speed: A vibrant yellow lightning bolt icon, surrounded by a faint blue aura, suggesting rapid movement. Has a subtle, quick 'flash' animation.

obstacles.wall: A section of chunky, brightly colored coral (pinks, purples, oranges) forming an impassable barrier. Slightly textured pixel art.
obstacles.rock: A large, rounded, dark grey pixelated boulder, possibly with a few green algae specks. Stationary and solid in appearance.

assets.background: The environment starts as warm, sandy pixel beach with soft orange-yellows, transitioning to a shallow, clear aqua blue water line, and eventually to deeper, rich blues and greens for the ocean floor, populated with simple, scattered coral patches and subtle water current lines.

ui_elements.score: A clear, chunky white pixel font displaying numbers against a small, translucent dark blue rectangular background, positioned in the top-right corner.
ui_elements.health_bar: A horizontal, segmented bar with a dark outline. Fills with bright green when full, turning yellow and then red as health decreases. A small, pixelated turtle head icon sits to the left of the bar.

theme: Create a super simple game where a turtle tries to get to the other side of a beach
